author: jm
msg: some build script changes, and an updated release summary

author: jm
msg: fix up version-mangling to produce correct results

author: ate
msg: Major improvement in Velocity speed by enabling template caching.
Note: there now is a 10 seconds delay for modificationCheckInterval.

author: pquerna
msg: Fix corruption of the pollset rings on Solaris 10. A pfd_elem_t was being inserted into a new ring without being removed first, corrupting the source ring.
Found and tested in the httpd zone on Helios.
